General.Name: Elron Electronic Industries Ltd
General.Description: Elron Ventures Ltd formerly known as Elron Electronic Industries Ltd, is a venture capital firm specializing in early stage and seed investment. The firm prefers to invest in cybersecurity, enterprise software or healthcare industries. The firm prefers to invest in Israel sector. Elron Ventures Ltd was founded in 1962 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel with additional office in New York, New York.
